mapper.select: SELECT se.id, se.express_name, se.express_logo, se.type, se.create_time, se.express_id, ie.express_name FROM weiit_shop_express se LEFT JOIN weiit_init_express_ali ie ON se.express_id = ie.express_id WHERE se.is_deleted = 0 AND se.shop_id = #{shop_id} order by se.create_time desc

SELECT se.id, se.express_name, se.express_logo, se.type, se.create_time, se.express_id, ie.express_name FROM weiit_shop_express se LEFT JOIN weiit_init_express_ali ie ON se.express_id = ie.express_id WHERE se.is_deleted = 0 AND se.express_id=#{express_id} AND se.shop_id = #{shop_id} order by se.create_time desc
SELECT * FROM weiit_init_express_ali where express_id not in (select express_id from weiit_shop_express where shop_id=#{shop_id})
mapper.delete: delete from weiit_shop_express where express_id=#{express_id} and shop_id = #{shop_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO weiit_shop_express ( express_name, express_logo, type, create_time, is_deleted, shop_id, express_id ) VALUES ( #{express_name}, #{express_logo}, #{type}, now(), 0, #{shop_id}, #{express_id} )
